UnitTests_all module¶

class UnitTests_all.MyTest(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

test_ecg_time()¶

This tests if the function properly generates a corresponding ECG time array.

test_findThreshold()¶

This tests the ability of the function to determine the maximum value in a given data stream, and use it to determine the threshold value

test_find_instantaneous_heart_rate()¶

This tests the ability of the function to find the instantaneous heart rate

test_fiveMinAvg()¶

This tests to see if the function can properly find a five min average of heart rate.

test_low_pass_filter()¶

This is a unit test to check if the function will successfully smooth out the function and remove noise.

test_oneMinAvg()¶

This tests to see if the function can properly find a one minute heart rate average

test_reading_data()¶

This function tests the reader function. A .bin file is run through and tested to see if the reader can properly detect it and read it using the proper reader method in the function.

test_remove_dc_offset()¶

This tests to see if the function can remove a dc offset from an array of ecg values.
